trans-unit.source: Represents a lexical scope within <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"></xref>, providing access to the start and end offsets of the scope, as well as its child and parent scopes.
trans-unit.target: 表示內的語彙範圍<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethod"> </xref>、 提供存取權的開始和結束位移的範圍，以及其子系和父範圍。

trans-unit.source: The SymScope class also provides access to all locals defined within the current scope.
trans-unit.target: SymScope 類別目前的範圍內定義的所有區域變數也都提供存取。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose*> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize*> methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫<> *> 和<> *> 釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源的目前執行個體所使用的方法<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only by the public <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize%2A> methods; do not call this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 會呼叫這個方法只由公用<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize%2A>方法。 請勿直接呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍的結束位移。

trans-unit.source: The ending Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset.
trans-unit.target: 結束 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 位移。

trans-unit.source: The offset is from the beginning of the method of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 此位移為從目前語彙範圍的方法的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 釋出 unmanaged 的資源並執行其他清除作業之前<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymScope"></xref>回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the child lexical scopes of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得的子語彙範圍的目前語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: The lexical scopes enclosed by the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 範圍所封入由目前語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: 沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local variables within the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍內的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: The local variables are returned in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 本機變數會傳回任何特定順序排列。

trans-unit.source: If a local variable changes its address within the current scope, that variable is returned multiple times, each with a different offset range.
trans-unit.target: 如果區域變數變更其在目前範圍內的位址，該變數會傳回許多次，各有不同的位移範圍。

trans-unit.source: The local variables within the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前語彙範圍內的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: There is insufficient memory to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: 沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求。

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情況下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>在所有情況下。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Gets the method that contains the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含目前語彙範圍的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that contains the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前語彙範圍的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent lexical scope of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得父語彙範圍的目前範圍。

trans-unit.source: The enclosing lexical scope of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 在目前範圍的封入語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the start offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍的起始位移。

trans-unit.source: The starting Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset.
trans-unit.target: 起始的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 位移。

trans-unit.source: The offset is from the beginning of the method of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 此位移為從目前語彙範圍的方法的開頭。
